name: Cirrus Gray
description:
Temp. Rating: -35 / 15 °C
These rugged, high ankle boots will keep your feet warm when venturing into wintry conditions. The Cirrus also integrates steel alloy links into the sole for added traction on icy surfaces.
description_cn:
适用温度：-35 / 15 °C
这些结实的高帮靴可以让你的脚在寒冷的环境中保持温暖. "卷云"将钢结构融入鞋底来增加它在冰面上的摩擦力.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Aparelli
